title: New Luxury Townhomes, Garages, Smoke Free!!
posting_body: Luxury community offers an unparalleled living experience.
Inside our well-appointed apartments, you'll find gorgeous sunlit floor plans with elegant 10-foot vaulted ceilings, sleek gourmet kitchens and luxurious finishes from top to bottom.
Relaxing fireside lounge, onsite coffee bar, convenient pet care station and miles of nearby walking and biking paths for weekend strolls through our stunning community.
One, and two-bedroom apartments, as well as spacious two, three and four bedroom townhomes to choose from.

Featuring sleek modern design, elegant contemporary kitchens finished with top-quality materials and stylish touches like vaulted ceilings, wood style plank flooring, accent paint and convenient USB charging stations.
Access to Founders Hall community center
Resident Lounge with Fireplace and TV
Private Enclosed Conference Room with Media and Speaker Capability
Pet-friendly Community with Pet Park and Pet Wash
Relaxing Courtyard with bar area and TV
AT&T U-verse and Time Warner Connectivity
Mail Room with Text/E-mail Notification for Parcel Pick-up
Please Call Desiree with DASH Apartment Locators
